info.title: People of Interest
info.summary: Scenario showing how how to show different webpages for different personas

alice.bio: Entrepreneur. Gamer. Explorer. Proud beer lover. Troublemaker. Twitter guru. Organizer.

bob.bio: Award-winning web guru. Unapologetic alcohol practitioner. Travel fanatic. Beer ninja. Reader.

chloe.bio: Award-winning food buff. Communicator. Infuriatingly humble zombieaholic. Total music fanatic.

dan.bio: Re organizer. Hipster-friendly food expert. Total tv practitioner. Friend of animals everywhere. Lifelong reader.
